displayProperties.description: …in circles. Ancient enemies return to plague old battlegrounds. Time moves…
displayProperties.name: Season of the Undying

displayProperties.description: Re-entwine the strands of time on Mercury and ignite the flames of hope.
displayProperties.name: Season of Dawn

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Roam the Tangled Shore, avenge the fall of a legend, and walk the right side of wrong in Gambit.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Outlaw

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Rediscover the glories of the past and acquire beautiful new instruments of destruction.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Forge

displayProperties.description: The Almighty bears down on the Last City. Join forces with unlikely allies to avert this crisis and destroy the last vestige of Cabal power in the system.
displayProperties.name: Season of Arrivals

displayProperties.description: With the Almighty bearing down on the Last City, Guardians from all walks of life unite to bring all their power to bear against the Cabal sun-killer and forge new bonds with old rivals.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Worthy

displayProperties.description: Battle Empress Caiatl's forces and prove your strength against the champions of the Cabal.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Chosen

displayProperties.description: As the Pyramids send the system into chaos, Guardians must work with unexpected allies to hunt the monstrous forces of Xivu Arath and unravel the Hive god's network of mysterious cryptoliths.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Hunt

displayProperties.description: Savathûn has been brought out of hiding, revealing a harrowing discovery that shakes the Vanguard. As Xivu Arath prepares to capture her sister, Savathûn offers you a bargain: free her from her worm, and she will reveal the truth about the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Lost

displayProperties.description: As the Last City is consumed by an Endless Night, Guardians must hack their way through the Vex Network with help from Mithrax, the Sacred Splicer.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Splicer

displayProperties.description: The prison ship of the exiled Cabal Emperor Calus has returned. But its reappearance heralds the beginning of the end as the once-dormant lunar Pyramid stirs to life once more. With the aid of Eris Morn's witchcraft, the Guardian must work with Empress Caiatl, Commander Zavala, and Crow to unravel the mysteries of the Leviathan and the lunar Pyramid and stop Calus before it is too late.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Haunted

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Risen

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of [Redacted]

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of [Redacted]

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Choose what kind of Guardian you will become. Reckon with the path that lies ahead.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Drifter

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Venture into the Infinite Forest, uncover the mysteries of Osiris, and seek new challenges on Mercury.
displayProperties.name: Curse of Osiris

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Search for relics of the past, learn the secrets of Rasputin, and unearth things long forgotten beneath the frozen surface of Mars.
displayProperties.name: Resurgence

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Lavish yourself in gifts from the mighty Emperor Calus. Seek lost treasures throughout the system.
displayProperties.name: Season of Opulence
